
{{alias}}( arr, idx )
    Returns an element from an indexed array-like object.

    The function does *not* perform bounds checking.

    Parameters
    ----------
    arr: ArrayLikeObject
        Input array.

    idx: integer
        Element index.

    Returns
    -------
    v: any
        Array element.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ], 2 )
    3

    See Also
    --------
